title: Maddy Loves to March
description: Maddy loves to march all around her house and outside. One day she has an opportunity to march with a real band in a parade. Supportive pictures and repetitive phrases support early readers.
reviewWords: band, door, march, parade, stairs, street
grammar: Capitalization                : Recognize and understand the use of capital letters at the beginning of a sentence and in proper nouns
wordWork: Position Words                : Identify and use position words
